text: Uss kay pehray daar insan kay aagay peechay muqarrar hain jo Allah kay hukum say iss ki nigehbani kertay hain. Kissi qom ki halat Allah Taalaa nahi badalta jabtak kay woh khud ussay na badlen jo unn kay dilon mein hai. Allah Taalaa jab kissi qom ki saza ka irada ker leta hai to woh badla nahi kerta aur siwaye uss kay koi bhi unn ka kaar saaz nahi
